ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Heritrix - 2 issues
ygData.msgSnippet: Crawl.log status codes are described here: http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/glossary.html#statuscodes The -2 indicates some sort of connection

Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Heritrix - 2 issues

Crawl.log status codes are described here:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/glossary.html#statuscodes

The '-2' indicates some sort of connection error -- such as the server 
not accepting the TCP connection, or dropping it. You may learn more in 
the local-errors.log but this is most likely an issue on the target 
server, not your configuration. (Unless, you've done something like 
aggressive crawling which has caused them to block you.)

I would need more details to know what's happening with the 
IllegalCharacterSet exception, and whether there's anything that can be 
done to address it.

- Gordon @ IA
